Class DiceGame

java.lang.Object
  DiceGame

public class DiceGame
extends java.lang.Object

The main class and driver of a dice game to be played with two six-sided dice.

Version:
2015.11.08 (4.0)
Author:
Bennett Alex Myers

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

DiceGame

public DiceGame()
The default constructor for an instance of the dice game. i.e. create a dice game played with two six-sided dice where the player starts with 100 tokens.

Method Detail

getCurrentRoll

public int getCurrentRoll()
Returns:
the most recent result of rolling the dice.

the list of dice in the game

Main method. Instantiate a diceGame and run its play method.

Main play routine; welcome user and initiate play loop.
